sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import image from "../Layout/bg.jpg" export class Result extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { name:null}; } handleSelaccChange=e=> this.setState({type: e.target.value}); handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); let data = { "type":this.state.type, } return fetch('http://localhost:3000/result', { method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify(data), headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, }) .then(res => res.json()) } render() { return (

Page is under Construction

      Balance Sheet

 financial statement that reports a company's assets, liabilities and shareholders' equity.

      Income Statement

 financial statement that shows you how profitable your business was over a given reporting period.

      Result

financial statement that reports the Result of profit or loss at the end of the year

      Calculations

TVA calculations and loans and other calculations 

About Us

This Website is made by Bootstrap and Reactjs with  a mongob Database to make accounting calculations 

) } } export default Result
